body.name: Bonsaii Paper Shredder for Home Use,6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder for Home Office with Handle for Document,Mail,Staple,Clip-3.4 Gal Wastebasket(C237-B)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 23 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Crosscut Paper & Credit Card Shredder】Bonsaii home paper shredder, shreds up to 6 sheets of paper at one time (Max 36 Sheets in one minutes) into tiny pieces measuring 13/64 x 45/64 inches (5x18mm), also destroys document/staples/credit cards/junk mails without plastic film.

【3-Minute Continuous Shredding】This small shredder can continuously shred about 100 sheets of paper for in 3mins. If keeps shredding over 3mins may overheat and automatically shut down, the unit enters the overheat protection, requiring 40 mins of cooling before next working.

【Easy Operation & Safe Protection】Auto start/stop and manual-reverse function protect the paper shredder from the frustration of paper jams. Overheat protection function tackle the trouble in using the shredder and prolong its lifetime. The document shredder will stop working once you lift the head, keeping you safe.

【3.4 Gal Transparent Wastebasket】The home shredder comes with portable handle design and small size of 14.1 x 11.8 x 7 inches, you can place it in the coner or under the desk. The crosscut shredder with 3.4 gallon basket of large transparent window can hold 180 sheets of A4 paper for less frequent emptying. Perfect for home or small home office.

【1 Year Warranty & Professional Service】Bonsaii provides 1-Year warranty for your shredders for home office heavy duty. If you meet any questions, please feel free to contact us. Tips: We test every shredder before shipping, which means you may see some paper shreds from the testing.

【Important Note】Refer to the user manual, troubleshooting guide, and instructional video before use. Do not spray or keep any aerosol products in or around the shredder, and do not shred items like metallic credit cards.
body.description: Home office shredder has the Jam free and overheated protection function, it is a good helper for your life. Cross-cut Shredder perfectly protects your privacy (security level P-4), helps you minimize information leakage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shreds up to 6 sheets at a time Overheating protection 3.4 Gallons transparent window bin. Portable handle for lift 7x24 hour online service 1 Year limited Protection Home office shredder has the Jam free and overheated protection function, it is a good helper for your life. Cross-cut Shredder perfectly protects your privacy (security level P-4), helps you minimize information leakage.

Overheat Protection Function If shredder runs continuously for more than 3 mins, may overheat. Please shut down the machine and cool it for 40 mins to recover. Auto Star and Manual Reverse Once detects papers, it will start to auto shred. when shred papers more than max capacity, you can use Rev mode to clean jam. High-Security P-4 Level This shredder can easily crush paper, staples, paper clips, can also destroy ATM receipts, credit cards, Except old newspapers.

IMPORTANT Q&A: Q1: Why doesn't the shredder work after plugging in? A1: Please make sure you assemble the shredder head and basket in correct directions. The front of the shredder head should be aligned with the each side of the trash can. A2: Overheating Protection, this design with 3 minutes continuous run time with 40 minutes cool down after use again. A3: Paper jams can also be one of the reasons for not working- Please use the FWD and REV function to clean up the cutter scraps. Q2: The cross-cut shredder is jammed. What should I do? A1: Please switch to FWD mode and shred the jammed paper compulsorily. If there are too many paper scraps in the feed slot, slide to FWD mode for a few seconds and then to REV mode for a few seconds to clear it. A2: With stubborn situations, you may need to clean the jammed paper with shredder oil. Start by drizzling oil into the feed slot where the paper is jammed. Let it soak for about 30 minutes, turn the shredder to Auto-On mode, a rigid sheet of cardstock (or folded file folder) can be fed into the shredder to help push the jammed paper through With the shredder unplugged. Q3: Why is the number of sheets that can be shredded lower than the maximum number of sheets described? A1: Please check if the paper is damp, contains plastic or too thick, if so, please let the paper dry before shredding, or remove the plastic part, or reduce shredding papers per pass. To extend the lifetime of the paper shredder, please don't shred more than 6 sheets in one time.

C237-B S120-C C209-D C275-A Cutting capacity 6-sheet 8-sheet 10-sheet 12-sheet Cutting type Cross-cut Strip-cut Cross-cut Cross-cut Cutting size 13/64 x 45/64 inches 15/64 x 11-11/16 inches 13/64 x 1- 37/64 inches 13/64 x 51/64 inches Security level P-4 P-2 P-3 P-4 Shred functions Paper/credit cards/clips Paper/credit cards/clips/staples/CDs/DVDs Paper/credit cards/clips/staples Paper/credit cards/clips/staples Duty cycle (mins) 4 on/40 off 2 on/60 off 4 on/40 off 5 on/40 off Bin capacity 3.4 Gallons 3.4 Gallons 5.5 Gallons 5.5 Gallons Noise level 70 dB 75 dB 70 dB 70 dB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shredder works amazing. It’s easy to use, set up, and it does the job. It’s compact and easy to store in my desk drawer. Be careful when cleaning it, as the blades are very sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Compact..safety built right in...a little weak for heavy work..says 6 sheet but works better with three and that's pushing it....good value for the cost..best used at home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size - Perfect for occassional shredding
reviews.reviewText: These days I only rarely have docs to shred. This is just the right size and price for that. Seems to work great as long you don’t exceed the reccomended 6 sheet mask. Only complaint is that they put a stupid sticker on the front that was impossible to remove without marring the surface of the bin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and weight for residential use
reviews.reviewText: My 12-sheet shredder just died one day. It was a heavy machine that sat atop a plastic basket and needed a good fit for the “actuating pin” to sit on this plastic receptacle bin. Over time, the weight of that shredder had cracked the bin and made everything unusable. No replacement for the bin available and superglue and duck tape just wasn’t working.I considered a new shredder that had a pull out bin, but after analyzing how much use (including number of sheets to feed into the machine at one time), cost, and overall weight of the machine, I realized a lightweight shredder might meet my needs. Good decision on my part.Excellent aspects:It is very lightweight machine that has an excellent and comfortable folding handle to lift it off the included basket. I have serious arthritis in both wrists and most fingers, and I can lift this off without any issues at all. It also easily seats right back into the correct position without any problems when put back onto the receptacle bin.It is pretty quiet when running.It has a window that clearly tells you when the bin is getting full, ensuring that you do not overfill and jam the machine. When full, the bin is easy to lift and dump its shredded pieces into a larger trash bag. The pieces may get a little statically attached to the plastic bin, so try covering the opening of the bin with a trash bag before you invert the bin and then tap the aides of the bin to get all the shredded pieces into the trash bag. I still had to round up some “shred debris” that clung to the inside of basket or missed the bag…not big deal.Price was awesome!Average/neutral aspects:My previous shredder had a lock out mechanism that let me ensure the shredder could not be accidentally turned on if the main selector switch was unintentionally moved to the “on” position. This machine does not have such a feature. It has 4 positions: FWD (on with continuous shredder wheels engaged regardless of whether something is sensed in the shredder slot), AUTO (power on, but shredder wheels not engaged unless something is sensed in the shredder slot), REV (shredder wheels in constant motion, but pushing things back out of the feeder slot), and OFF (which powers down the machine, red power light goes off). As there is no “guard switch” to prevent accidental activation, I simply unplugged it when I am not using it for a time and if any small children/pets are around.It also has an overheat light if the motor os getting too hot from continuous or heavy load use.It is not top heavy, but still can be tipped over if you move or bump against it. I have it freestanding on the floor between a similar sized trash can and the side of my desk. I have had no problems with it tipping or moving during use.There is a credit card slot, and while the machine will “chew” these up, you can hear the machine slow and even see the credit card wobble as it is being shredded. Worked OK as I only shred a card or two annually.I would not place more than 3-4 sheets of regular paper in at one time as you can hear the machine slowing to shred that amount. I am sure it can do more, but I decided to simply be cautious. The machine does shred as quickly as most residential use machines, however.Note: The actual continuous run time on this machine is much better than advertised. I ran it for 10 minutes without any problems, although I was only inserting 1-2 sheets at a time, not the max they say you can at a time. No overheat light came one, albeit the top of the machine did become a little warm.Overall, very happy with this machine. It will only get used every couple of weeks and then for only about 15-20 sheets of paper or other junk ail (credit card mailings, credit card receipts, etc…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is not an Office Shredder, barely a home office shredder. If you have a lot of paper you need to shred on a regular basis. This is not for you. It works very well, but has a low run time and High Cool down time. It cross cut but honestly if you want maximum security this isnt for you either. Don’t get me wrong, it does very good. Just manage you expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well for my home office, easy to use and clean. Small size, perfect for small home office/use. Moderate noise level youde expect from a paper shredder, not awful. Lightweight easy to move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loud, but I love the sound of junk mail dying.
reviews.reviewText: Well, let me tell you about my new favorite home appliance, the 6-Sheet Crosscut Paper and Credit Card Shredder, aka my paper munching beast! I mean, who knew shredding could be so entertaining?First off, this thing is an absolute champ. I've been on a mission to declutter my life, and this shredder has been my trusty sidekick in the battle against rogue paper. I kid you not; I ran it for a whopping 50 minutes straight, and it didn't even break a sweat. I've never seen a more committed piece of machinery. It's like the Terminator of the paper-shredding world – relentless and unstoppable.Now, here's where it gets interesting. I decided to put this bad boy to the test with my mountain of unopened junk mail. It handled it like a champ, but I could almost hear it grumble a bit. It's like the shredder equivalent of a sigh, you know? Like, "Come on, really? More junk?" It did slow down a tad, but hey, even superheroes need a breather when faced with an avalanche of unwanted credit card offers and pizza coupons.The crosscut action is like a dance, gracefully turning my sensitive information into a confetti party. It's a disco for documents! The credit card shredding is especially satisfying – talk about cutting up those bad spending habits, literally.But the real star of the show is the noise. Oh boy, the symphony of destruction that emanates from this thing is a head-turner. It's like having a tiny rock concert in my living room every time I decide to declutter. My neighbors probably think I'm running a secret home office or moonlighting as a spy with all the shredding espionage going on.In conclusion, this Paper Shredder for Home Use is not just a machine; it's a statement. It has the endurance of an Olympic athlete, the precision of a surgeon, and the dramatic flair of a Hollywood blockbuster. If you want to turn your mundane paperwork into a thrilling spectacle, get yourself one of these bad boys. It's the rockstar of the shredding world – just make sure to bring your air guitar! 🎸✂️

El corte que realiza es adecuado, parece confeti. Debes tener cuidado de solo colocar 3 horas máximo ya que si pones mas se atora, y dejarla descansar ya que se caliente y se apaga en automático, es para uso en casa, muy práctica.
Muito fraca, não durou nem 1 mês…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shredder works well enough but it struggles with 6 sheets, but 4 is ok, it's also slightly noisier than my old one, but cuts better,I also like the window in the front so you can tell when to empty it, plenty good enough for occasional use.
